html:
MONEY RECEIPT
MR. No.
Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.nowdate()) }}
Received with thanks from {{ doc.pay_to_recd_from or doc.customer }}, the sum of Ngultrum ({{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.net_amount) }}) by Cash/Draft/Cheque No. {{ doc.ref_no }} date {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.reference_date) }} in payment for {{ doc.remarks }}
Nu. {{ frappe.format_value(doc.net_amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
For Construction Development Corporation Limited
This print is system generated and should be considered VALID only with appropriate seal and/or signature.
Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}
name: Money Receipt(MP)
